carpentry-business-website.title: Almer Carpentry Business Website
carpentry-business-website.shortDescription: My first complete web project, built entirely with JavaScript for a real local business.
carpentry-business-website.longDescription: Almer was my very first full project and the one where I truly learned how to build a real website from start to finish. I handled everything myself, from structuring the pages to implementing the UI and logic. This project is built entirely with JavaScript (no TypeScript) and taught me how to think like a developer solving real business problems, not just following tutorials.
carpentry-business-website.problem: The business needed a simple but professional online presence to showcase services and previous work, without relying on complex tools or third-party platforms.
carpentry-business-website.solution: I built a clean, responsive website using modern JavaScript and Next.js, focusing on clarity, performance, and usability. The site clearly presents the business services, past projects, and contact information in a way that is easy for both users and the business owner.
highlights: Real client and real business needs
Strong learning experience in structure and problem-solving

cyber-security-blog.title: 0wnit – Cyber Security Blog
cyber-security-blog.shortDescription: A cyber security blog platform with custom-designed UI and CMS-powered content creation.
cyber-security-blog.longDescription: 0wnit is the project where I focused heavily on design and UI quality. I designed and built every component myself, paying close attention to layout, spacing, typography, and overall user experience. The platform functions as a blog where users can create and manage posts through Sanity CMS, making it both flexible and scalable.
cyber-security-blog.problem: Most cyber security blogs look generic and focus only on content, ignoring design and usability. I wanted to create something that feels modern, readable, and visually distinctive.
cyber-security-blog.solution: I designed a custom component system from scratch and connected it to Sanity CMS, allowing blog posts to be created and managed easily. The result is a fast, clean, and visually polished blog platform that balances strong design with powerful content management.
highlights: Strong focus on UX and readability
Modern, minimal, and consistent design system
One of my strongest design-focused projects

ai-learning-platform.title: Knowledge Flow – AI Learning Platform
ai-learning-platform.shortDescription: An AI-powered learning platform built for a hackathon using OpenAI integration.
ai-learning-platform.longDescription: Knowledge Flow was built as part of a hackathon, where the goal was to explore how AI can support personalized learning. I developed the frontend and integrated AI features using the OpenAI API, focusing on interaction, clarity, and fast iteration under time pressure.
ai-learning-platform.problem: Traditional learning platforms often lack personalization and real-time feedback, making it harder for users to stay engaged.
ai-learning-platform.solution: By integrating AI through the OpenAI API, the platform can provide dynamic learning assistance and content suggestions. The project demonstrates how AI can enhance educational experiences when combined with a clean and intuitive frontend.

ai-next-earth.title: Next Earth – AI-Powered Volunteering Platform
ai-next-earth.shortDescription: A hackathon project that uses AI to help users discover volunteering opportunities.
ai-next-earth.longDescription: Next Earth was created for a hackathon with the idea of using AI to connect people with volunteering opportunities that match their interests and skills. I worked on the frontend and AI integration, combining OpenAI-powered logic with real-world datasets to produce meaningful results.
ai-next-earth.problem: Finding relevant volunteering opportunities can be overwhelming, especially when platforms are not personalized.
ai-next-earth.solution: By using AI and structured datasets, the platform helps users discover volunteering roles that better align with their preferences. This project allowed me to explore AI-driven recommendations and data presentation in a real-world context.

back-office-dashboard.title: Back Office Dashboard
back-office-dashboard.shortDescription: An Angular-based back office application built to learn enterprise-style frontend development.
back-office-dashboard.longDescription: I built this back office dashboard specifically to learn Angular and understand how large-scale, enterprise-style applications are structured. The project focuses on components, services, routing, and state management patterns commonly used in admin and internal tools.
back-office-dashboard.problem: Many frontend developers struggle when moving from simple apps to complex dashboards and internal systems.
back-office-dashboard.solution: By building a back office application from scratch, I learned how to structure Angular projects, manage forms, handle data flows, and build reusable components that scale well in larger applications.

e-commerce-platform.title: Auren – Full E-Commerce Platform
e-commerce-platform.shortDescription: A complete, production-level e-commerce platform with advanced features and integrations.
e-commerce-platform.longDescription: Auren is my most complete and ambitious project. It is a full e-commerce platform that includes product management, user authentication, wishlists, orders, analytics, and a complete back office. I designed and built the frontend architecture, integrated multiple services, and focused on creating a realistic production-ready system.
e-commerce-platform.problem: Building a real e-commerce platform requires handling many complex flows such as user accounts, orders, analytics, emails, and content management — all while keeping performance and UX high.
e-commerce-platform.solution: I used Next.js for performance and scalability, Sanity CMS for content management, a database for users and orders, and implemented email notifications for order placement and status changes. The admin back office allows managing products, orders, and analytics efficiently.
highlights: Admin dashboard for analytics and order status
Most complex and complete project I’ve built
